Class Square3x3

  • java.lang.Object
    • Square3x3
  • public class Square3x3
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a 2D array of integers of the size 3x3.
    Version:
    (10.12.21)
    Author:
    Roy Bachar

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Square3x3()
      Construct and initializes a 2D array of the size 3x3 with the values of -1 in each cell.
      Square3x3​(int[][] array)
      Construct a 2D array of the size 3x3 whose values are taken from the given array.

      Copy constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean allThere()
      A method that checks if all the digits between 1 - 9 are present in this sqare3X3 array.
      int getCell​(int row, int col)
      Returns The value of the cell at the provided index of this square3x3 array.
      void setXY​(int row, int col, int value)
      Sets the value of the cell at the provided [row, col] index of this square3x3 array to the provided value only if both the row and column are valid.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this square3x3 array in the format: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9
      void whosThereCol​(int col, boolean[] values)
      A method that takes a column number and a boolean array of size 10, then iterates through the specified column of this square3x3, and assigns true to cells in the given values array who's indices are equal to the values in the column.
      void whosThereRow​(int row, boolean[] values)
      A method that takes a row number and a boolean array of size 10, then iterates through the specified row of this square3x3 and assigns true to cells in the given values array who's indices are equal to the values in the row.

        public static final byte WHOS_THERE_SIZE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Square3x3

        public Square3x3()
        Construct and initializes a 2D array of the size 3x3 with the values of -1 in each cell.

      • Square3x3

        public Square3x3​(int[][] array)
        Construct a 2D array of the size 3x3 whose values are taken from the given array. If the given array is bigger than 3x3, only the first 3x3 cell values are taken. If the given array is smaller, the rest of the cells are initialized to -1.

      • Square3x3

        public Square3x3​(Square3x3 other)
        Copy constructor. Constructs a 2D array of size 3x3 whose values are copied from the array of the given Square3x3 object.

    • Method Detail

      • getCell

        public int getCell​(int row,
                   int col)
        Returns The value of the cell at the provided index of this square3x3 array.
        Returns:
        The value of the cell at the given [row, col] index.

      • setXY

        public void setXY​(int row,
                  int col,
                  int value)
        Sets the value of the cell at the provided [row, col] index of this square3x3 array to the provided value only if both the row and column are valid.
        Parameters:
        row - The row index where the given value should be set.
        col - The col index where the given value should be set.
        value - The value to set at the given [row, col] index.

      • allThere

        public boolean allThere()
        A method that checks if all the digits between 1 - 9 are present in this sqare3X3 array.
        Returns:
        true if all the digits between 1 - 9 are present in this square 3x3 array.

      • whosThereRow

        public void whosThereRow​(int row,
                         boolean[] values)
        A method that takes a row number and a boolean array of size 10, then iterates through the specified row of this square3x3 and assigns true to cells in the given values array who's indices are equal to the values in the row.
        Parameters:
        row - The row number to iterate through in this square3x3 array.
        values - The array to modify according to the chosen row values.

      • whosThereCol

        public void whosThereCol​(int col,
                         boolean[] values)
        A method that takes a column number and a boolean array of size 10, then iterates through the specified column of this square3x3, and assigns true to cells in the given values array who's indices are equal to the values in the column.
        Parameters:
        col - The column number to iterate through in this square3x3 array.
        values - The array to modify according to the chosen column values.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of this square3x3 array in the format: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string representation of this square3x3 array.
